casebody.data:
No. 10-97. Patrick J. Lynch, as President of the Patrolmen’s Benevolent Association of the City of New York, Inc., et al., Petitioners v. City of New York, New York, et al. 562 U.S. 995, 131 S. Ct. 415,

178 L. Ed. 2d 344,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8217. October 18, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 589 F.3d 94.
